descriptions:
Product Name: Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair

Experience ultimate comfort and support with our Darkecho Gaming Office Chair. This versatile chair is perfect for both gaming and office use.

**Design and Material:**

The chair is upholstered in premium soft PU leather, featuring hand-sewn diamond cross stitching for added durability and style. The color is a vibrant purple, making it a standout piece in any room.

**Ergonomic Features:**

The chair comes with a lumbar pillow that is USB-powered and offers a massage function, ensuring optimal back support and relaxation. The headrest is adjustable and detachable, while the lumbar support is adjustable for maximum comfort. The retractable footrest allows you to kick back and relax during breaks.

**Adjustability:**

This chair offers a wide range of adjustability options. The reclining feature allows you to adjust the backrest from 90 to 15​5 degrees. The chair also swivels a full 360 degrees, is height adjustable, and rocks up to 15 degrees. The adjustable armrests can be moved vertically and horizontally, and are coated in soft PU leather for added comfort.

**Durability and Safety:**

The chair's frame is made of integrated metal and sits on a 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover wheelbase that has been tested for rolling over 2000 miles. The chassis is thickened and explosion-proof for added safety. The gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certified, ensuring durability and safety.

**Assembly and Warranty:**

The chair is easy to assemble with pre-assembled screws and comes with a one-month free return policy. The parts replacement warranty lasts for 5 years.

**Customer Service:**

Our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist with any queries or issues.

Experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality with our Darkecho Gaming Office Chair. Order yours today!
